trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing and interacting with the Text Services Framework, which provides support for alternate text input methods such as speech and handwriting.
Gets a value that indicates whether or not this input method can display configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
**true** if configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] can be displayed; otherwise, **false**.
This property has no default value.
Gets a value that indicates whether this input method can display word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
**true** if word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] can be displayed; otherwise, **false**.
This property has no default value.
Gets a reference to any currently active input method associated with the current context.
A reference to an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod"></xref> object associated with the current context, or **null** if there is no active input method.
This property has no default value.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the input scope.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref> object representing the current input scope for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*>.
The current value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*>.
The current value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*>.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*>.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*>.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Gets or sets the current state of handwriting input for this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current input method state for handwriting input.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current conversion mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the conversion mode.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current sentence mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref> enumerations specifying the sentence mode.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current state of the input method editor associated with this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the state of the input method editor associated with this input method.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the current state of microphone input for this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current input method state for microphone input.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*> attached property.
To be added.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*> attached property.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref> object representing the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope*> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*> attached property.
The new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled*> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*> attached property.
The new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended*> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*> attached property.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration representing the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode*> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*> attached property.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration representing the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode*> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*> attached property.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration representing the new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState*> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Displays configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.

Displays configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service, using a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that will be used as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
Accepts a specified string as the default value to register.
Typically the value specified by *registeredText* is used to pre-populate the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
A string that specifies a value to register.
Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.

Accepts a specified string as the default value to register, and a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Typically the value specified by *registeredText* is used to pre-populate the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that will be used as the parent element for the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A string that specifies a value to register.
Gets or sets the speech mode for this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"></xref> enumeration specifying the current speech mode.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"></xref>.
Occurs when the input method state (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.ImeState*> property) changes.
To be added.
